title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + When the system is the abuser: Investigating injustice in child welfare
description: Three veteran investigative reporters share methods for exploring systemic problems in foster care systems, including using public records such as Inspector General investigations, quality assurance division data, child death reviews, and emails among administrators, and nurturing relationships with influential sources such as children's advocates, legal services groups, and federally funded advocacy groups for people with disabilities.
